meanings.sent1: The ozonous layer in the atmosphere helps protect us from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ozonous properties of the air sample.
meanings.sent3: The ozonous smell after a thunderstorm always reminds me of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was ozonous, filling the room with a refreshing energy.
meanings.sent5: The ozonous taste of the freshly picked strawberries was invigorating.

meanings.sent1: The ozonous air near the waterfall felt crisp and clean.

meanings.sent3: The ozonous breeze made the kite fly higher than ever before.
meanings.sent4: His words had an ozonous effect on her mood, lifting her spirits instantly.
meanings.sent5: The ozonous glow of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
